system.descriptionText: At the start of a Combat Encounter, As long as the Character is not surprised the make +0 Perception Test. If successful, all Player Characters with a Comrade in Cohesion gain +2 to Initiative and do not count as being Surprised during their First Round of Combat.

description.value: At the start of a Combat Encounter, As long as the Character is not surprised the make +0 Perception Test. If successful, all Player Characters with a Comrade in Cohesion gain +2 to Initiative and do not count as being Surprised during their First Round of Combat.
